mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD4 ( title, member4_idx, fileName, content ) values ( #{title}, #{member4_idx}, #{fileName}, #{content} )
mapper.select: SELECT B.IDX, B.TITLE, M.USERNAME AS member4_username, B.WDATE, B.VIEWCOUNT, B.FILENAME, M.USERID AS member4_userid FROM MEMBER4 M, BOARD4 B WHERE M.IDX = B.MEMBER4_IDX ORDER BY IDX DESC
SELECT B.IDX, B.TITLE, M.USERNAME AS member4_username, B.WDATE, B.VIEWCOUNT, B.FILENAME, M.USERID AS member4_userid FROM MEMBER4 M, BOARD4 B WHERE M.IDX = B.MEMBER4_IDX AND B.IDX=#{IDX}
SELECT fileName FROM BOARD4 WHERE IDX=#{IDX}
